title: I found a way to fix Riven!

replies.body: lol riven is a risky pick in solo queue especially against a smart jungler, and can get hard countered by a good Jax/Nasus/Garen/Renekton/Jayce/Gnar/etc etc

and as it stands she is pretty damn balanced, like her early isn't nearly as strong as before and you actually need to practice her a fair bit to carry games, to pick her in LCS you need to have balls of steel as well

Yet most people who play against/with her complain about her, and you don't see the complaining with someone who is actually balanced like taric, kennen or rumble. so therefore there must be a difference between her and them that people don't like.
and don't bring LCS into it, the game changes drastically at that high a level its almost an entirely different game than us non challenger ppl play.
so you can either re-balance all the champs to suit the level of a few hundred people at the top end or balance them to serve the other few million.

The problem with your strategy there is that most of the champs you mentioned are hated on just as much if not more than riven.
so you are just escalating the problem, not fixing it.

i found another way.

git gud.

No matter how good you are, you cannot kite 4 dashes, a stun and an AoE execute.

if she had mana she would be so much less broken, she would still have 4 dashes an AOE stun a knock up and a mega shield not to mention her damage but it would certainly bring her back down to earth a lot more.
